channel.title: Internet Connection for Free - vista
channel.description:
This trick is practicly illegal - i do not take any blaim if you are cought.
Ok, first off to do this you need a vista computer with Wifi - I dont think this works with Xp as i have never tried.
First off go to control panel and click Network and Internet.
Second, look at the first option - Network and sharing centre. Either click the sublink ' Connect to a network ' or click the tab its self and then select connect to a network.
For this part to work you need to have your Wifi ON. Ok, select a connection from the list, it must have no passcode so this meens it must have no security.
After you have selected a network you can set this connection to startup when your computer starts - So you connection always stays with you depending where you are (you cant go to far away from where you started the connection)
